Realistic.q: I enjoy solving logical problems and building new things from scratch.
I get a sense of satisfaction when debugging or fixing technical problems.
I prefer working alone and focusing deeply for long hours.
I get bored doing repetitive tasks.
I prefer technical mastery over managing people.

Investigative.q: I love analyzing data and discovering patterns or insights.
I prefer working with precise facts, figures, and structured data.
I am detail-oriented and easily notice inconsistencies.
I remain calm and analytical under pressure.
I’m motivated by accuracy and precision in my work.

Artistic.q: I enjoy creating prototypes or visualizing how users will interact with a product.
I enjoy talking to people to understand their needs and pain points.
I’m comfortable working on abstract ideas and uncertain goals.
I want to see the impact of my work quickly and visually.

Social.q: I enjoy working in teams and leading group discussions.
I like convincing others and presenting ideas clearly.
I enjoy talking to people to understand their needs and pain points.
I like understanding how technology supports business goals.

Enterprising.q: I enjoy planning, managing people, and coordinating tasks.
I like leading projects and decision making.
I value leadership and decision-making responsibilities.
I like organizing information so others can understand it easily.
I feel energized by helping a team meet deadlines.

Conventional.q: I find satisfaction in identifying errors and improving quality.
I enjoy organizing information so others can understand it easily.
I prefer working with precise facts, figures, and structured data.
